original_text: Jesus went into a house and the disciples were alone with him. Then they asked him, ‘Why could we not cause the bad spirit to leave the boy?’
korean_text: 집에 들어가시매 제자들이 조용히 묻자오되 우리는 어찌하여 능히 그 귀신을 쫓아내지 못하였나이까

sentences.original_text: and the disciples were alone with him
'Why could we not cause the bad spirit to leave the boy?'
sentences.korean_translation: '우리는 어찌하여 그 악한 귀신을 소년에게서 쫓아내지 못했나이까?'
